SHA1

An ActionScript 3 implementation of Secure Hash Algorithm, SHA-1, as defined in FIPS PUB 180-1 Copyright © 2007 Henri Torgemane

Derived from

A JavaScript implementation of the Secure Hash Algorithm, SHA-1, as defined in FIPS PUB 180-1 Version 2.1a Copyright Paul Johnston 2000 - 2002.  Other contributors: Greg Holt, Andrew Kepert, Ydnar, Lostinet

See LICENSE.txt for full license information.
